Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6)
fire damage.
The dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving
throw, taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Red Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14
